report.description: Check all registered participants of a conference and see who has not paid yet. Using the gift system, not considering cancelled batches, but making no difference between unposted and posted batches. This will be solved differently as soon as we use a proper Accounts Receivable system.

queryDetail.value: SELECT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS PartnerKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS PartnerName, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_st_app_date_d AS DateRegistered FROM PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_p_partner WHERE PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_st_confirmed_option_n = {{param_conference_key_n}} AND PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_pm_short_term_application.p_partner_key_n AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PUB_a_gift_batch, PUB_a_gift, PUB_a_gift_detail WHERE PUB_a_gift_batch.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_gl_effective_date_d >= {#param_start_date_payments#} AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_status_c <> 'Cancelled' AND PUB_a_gift.a_ledger_number_i = PUB_a_gift_batch.a_ledger_number_i AND PUB_a_gift.a_batch_number_i = PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_number_i AND PUB_a_gift.p_donor_key_n = PUB_pm_short_term_application.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_a_gift_detail.a_ledger_number_i = PUB_a_gift.a_ledger_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_detail.a_batch_number_i = PUB_a_gift.a_batch_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_detail.a_gift_transaction_number_i = PUB_a_gift.a_gift_transaction_number_i AND
